name: The Land of the Seazogs
description: Professor Meme, a renowned 164-year-old genetic scientist, receives a mysterious call for help from his old friend Gustav, the head of the animal research base on Zerulia, an inhospitable planet inhabited by ancient aquatic creatures: the Seazogs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Atom 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated 64MB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated 2GB RAM Storage: 8 GB available space
